typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		FULL_NAME as string,
		EMAIL as string,
		PHONE as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCus
source(output(
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		PRODUCT_DES as string,
		UNIT_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimProduct
source(output(
		Day_WK as integer,
		Month_WK as integer,
		FullDate as timestamp,
		Year_Code as integer,
		Month_Code as integer,
		Month_Name as string,
		WeekDay_Code as integer,
		Day_Name as string,
		Is_WeekDay as boolean,
		NumberOfWorkDays as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimDate
source(output(
		CUSTOMER_ID as integer,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS as string,
		PRODUCT_ID as string,
		PNAME as string,
		CATEGORY as string,
		SUB_CATEGORY as string,
		PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		UNIT_SELL_PRICE as decimal(10,2),
		CURRENCY as string,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		WAREHOUSE as string,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source(output(
		OrderDate as integer,
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		AMOUNT as decimal(10,2),
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> OrderFact
source(output(
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_DATE as timestamp,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimOrder
source(output(
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		WAREHOUSE_ID as string,
		NAME as string,
		LOCATION as string,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimWarehouse
Exists2, DimCus lookup(source1@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCus@CUSTOMER_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		CUSTOMER_ADDRESS,
		PRODUCT_ID,
		PNAME,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		WAREHOUSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, DimProduct lookup(Select1@PRODUCT_ID == DimProduct@PRODUCT_ID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		WAREHOUSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select5, DimDate lookup(ORDER_DATE == FullDate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
Lookup3 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		ORDER_WK,
		WAREHOUSE,
		Day_WK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select6, OrderFact exists(Day_WK == OrderDate
	&& Select6@CUSTOMER_WK == OrderFact@CUSTOMER_WK
	&& Select6@PRODUCT_WK == OrderFact@PRODUCT_WK,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
Exists1, OrderFact lookup(Day_WK == OrderDate
	&& Select6@CUSTOMER_WK == OrderFact@CUSTOMER_WK
	&& Select6@PRODUCT_WK == OrderFact@PRODUCT_WK,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup4
Lookup4 derive(ModifiedDate = currentTimestamp(),
		AMOUNT = UNIT_PRICE*Select6@QUANTITY_ORDERED) ~> Modifydata
Modifydata select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK = {Select6@CUSTOMER_WK},
		PRODUCT_WK = {Select6@PRODUCT_WK},
		QUANTITY_ORDERED = {Select6@QUANTITY_ORDERED},
		ORDER_WK = {Select6@ORDER_WK},
		OrderDate = Day_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK = {Select6@WAREHOUSE_WK},
		ModifiedDate,
		AMOUNT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select2, DimOrder lookup(Select2@ORDER_DATE == DimOrder@ORDER_DATE,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup5
Lookup5 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE = {Select2@ORDER_DATE},
		UNIT_PRICE,
		ORDER_WK,
		WAREHOUSE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select5
Select4 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Select3, DimWarehouse lookup(WAREHOUSE == NAME,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup6
Lookup6 select(mapColumn(
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		ORDER_DATE,
		UNIT_PRICE,
		ORDER_WK,
		WAREHOUSE,
		Day_WK,
		WAREHOUSE_WK
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select6
source1, DimCus exists(source1@CUSTOMER_ID == DimCus@CUSTOMER_ID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists2
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		OrderDate as integer,
		CUSTOMER_WK as integer,
		ORDER_WK as integer,
		PRODUCT_WK as integer,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED as integer,
		AMOUNT as decimal(10,2),
		WAREHOUSE_WK as integer,
		ModifiedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['CUSTOMER_WK','PRODUCT_WK','ORDER_WK'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		OrderDate,
		CUSTOMER_WK,
		ORDER_WK,
		PRODUCT_WK,
		QUANTITY_ORDERED,
		AMOUNT,
		WAREHOUSE_WK,
		ModifiedDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
